layman_description: A green camouflage backpack for concealment in wilderness.
technical_description: Armor slot item with tier classification and weight properties tied to armor progression.
player_impact: Reduces detection range in outdoor environments, helping players avoid zombie hordes and sneak past threats.

layman_description: A white snow-pattern backpack effective in winter terrain.
technical_description: Equippable armor item with custom tint color and material properties for cold biome adaptation.
player_impact: Increases visibility advantage in snow biomes while providing moderate storage and cold resistance.

layman_description: A decaying cupboard with corpse remains scattered around it.
technical_description: Container block with loot probability tied to corpse dismemberment values and debris particles.
player_impact: High-risk loot location that requires careful navigation; alerts nearby zombies to player proximity.

layman_description: A filling meat stew that restores hunger and provides stamina boost.
technical_description: Consumable food item with health regeneration values and buff timers for nutrition mechanics.
player_impact: Essential early survival food source; can be crafted in bulk for expeditions and storage.

layman_description: An automated wooden gate trap that can be triggered by proximity sensors.
technical_description: Activatable block with power requirements and trigger delay properties controlling zombie crowd control.
player_impact: Defensive building element that requires power investment; effective for creating choke points during horde nights.

layman_description: A firearm modification enabling burst fire mode for rapid shots.
technical_description: Weapon modifier with burst fire rate parameters unlocked through perk progression system.
player_impact: Transforms slow weapons into mid-range burst firearms; requires ammunition expenditure but increases damage output per second.

layman_description: A massive storage container for bulk item organization.
technical_description: Container block with maximum item count and slot configuration supporting specialized storage grouping.
player_impact: Essential base infrastructure for managing large quantities of crafting materials and resources without inventory overflow.

layman_description: Protective leather gloves that absorb melee damage and improve grip.
technical_description: Equippable armor piece with armor rating values and slash resistance modifiers for hand slots.
player_impact: Early protective gear that reduces incoming melee damage; allows carrying heavier weapons without penalty.

layman_description: An unsecured iron door frame awaiting installation of door mechanics.
technical_description: Door block variant with material upgrades affecting health pools and demolition time through progression.
player_impact: Provides heavy security option for bases; requires forged steel craft and substantial player investment to fortify.

layman_description: Industrial steel bolts used in mechanical construction and repairs.
technical_description: Crafting ingredient with stack limits and forged metal classifications for mechanical repairs.
player_impact: Required component for trap construction and advanced tool repairs; must be farmed from specific loot containers.

layman_description: A residential mailbox containing occasional correspondence and valuables.
technical_description: Interactable container with take delay properties and loot list distribution for POI loot progression.
player_impact: Low-risk loot source in residential areas; contains occasional high-value items that reward exploration.

layman_description: A steel wrench for disassembling mechanical devices and fastening connections.
technical_description: Multi-purpose tool with block damage values and specialized crafting requirement tags.
player_impact: Essential inventory item for trap maintenance and salvaging mechanical parts from vehicles and blocks.

layman_description: Concrete flooring embedded with protruding steel spikes for area denial.
technical_description: Hazard block with damage type classification and secondary buff application for entity contact.
player_impact: Effective zombie crowd control that damages and slows hoards; requires maintenance but provides area protection.

layman_description: A potato seed for crop cultivation in player-owned farms.
technical_description: Plantable seed item with fertility level modifiers and growth stage progression mechanics.
player_impact: Enables long-term food sustainability; allows players to establish self-sufficient agricultural operations.

layman_description: A compact tactical bag containing lightweight weapons and ammunition.
technical_description: Loot container with weighted list distribution prioritizing ranged weapons and ammo stacks.
player_impact: Early combat resource opportunity that can jumpstart player armament progression significantly.

layman_description: Blunt-impact ammunition rounds that stun targets without piercing.
technical_description: Projectile variant with zero piercing damage and knockback force parameters for crowd control weapons.
player_impact: Specialized ammo option for non-lethal crowd management and zombie crowd control situations.

layman_description: A metal container storing volatile gunpowder charge.
technical_description: Explosive hazard block with damage radius properties and dismemberment multiplier effects on nearby entities.
player_impact: Dangerous to disturb; creates environmental hazard that can aid or hinder player combat situations.

layman_description: Advanced armor plating tier 4 modification for protective gear.
technical_description: Armor enhancement modifier with escalating armor rating values relative to previous tier versions.
player_impact: Late-game progression material that significantly improves protective gear durability and safety.

layman_description: A large commercial coffee machine used in restaurants for bulk beverage production.
technical_description: Functional appliance block with fuel consumption and output item list for prepared beverages.
player_impact: Non-essential utility that can improve morale and provide small stat buffs in player settlements.

layman_description: A mystery reward item with randomized content from quest completion.
technical_description: Loot container item with random selection algorithm weighted by difficulty tier and progression stage.
player_impact: Incentivizes quest completion; provides surprise loot that can advance multiple playstyle approaches.

layman_description: A floor grate infused with propane-fed flame traps for area denial.
technical_description: Fire hazard block with active radius effects applying burn buffs and damage over time to entities.
player_impact: Effective against zombie hordes but consumes fuel; provides powerful defense at cost of resources.

layman_description: Raw copper ore ore used in electrical components and alloys.
technical_description: Raw resource with smelting time properties and refined metal conversion ratios for advanced crafting.
player_impact: Essential ingredient for electrical systems; forces players to establish mining or looting routes.

layman_description: A wooden shoe display rack containing footwear and accessories.
technical_description: Container block with specialized loot list targeting armor feet items and foot cosmetics.
player_impact: Provides footwear progression early in gameplay; allows players to obtain mobility boots.

layman_description: A reinforced iron hammer for tool repair with superior striking force.
technical_description: Repair tool with repair amount values and experience multiplier bonuses for maintenance activities.
player_impact: Unlocks expedited tool repair cycles; significantly reduces downtime on damaged equipment during expeditions.

layman_description: An ornamental wall-mounted safe with secure storage locking mechanism.
technical_description: Lockable container with lock difficulty ratings and lockpick break chance properties for security.
player_impact: High-value loot container in POIs; rewards lockpick skill investment with premium rewards.

layman_description: Corn crop at mid-growth stage showing visible stalk development.
technical_description: Growing plant block with fertile level progression and harvest readiness state transitions.
player_impact: Allows players to anticipate harvests; provides visual feedback on farm investment progress.

layman_description: Bare barbed wire strands creating painful barrier terrain.
technical_description: Hazard contact block with damage type classification and persistent application of bleeding debuffs.
player_impact: Effective on player-controlled bases but harms allies; requires careful placement to avoid friendly fire.

layman_description: Red paint pigment for cosmetic block coloring in construction.
technical_description: Crafting ingredient with color value parameters applied during block painting mechanics.
player_impact: Allows personalization of base aesthetic; enables creation of faction-themed territory marking.

layman_description: A reinforced gun cabinet with maximum security locking and alarm system.
technical_description: Container block with upgraded lock difficulty and reduced lockpick break chance properties.
player_impact: Late-game chest variant; rewards patient lockpicking with significant weapons and ammunition caches.

layman_description: A raw chicken egg that can be cooked or used in recipes.
technical_description: Ingredient item with cooking requirement flag and crafting recipe prerequisites for prepared meals.
player_impact: Establishes chicken farming sustainability; enables renewable food production in player settlements.

layman_description: An old residential couch positioned at room center for sitting.
technical_description: Furniture block with cosmetic classification and rest bonus properties for morale mechanics.
player_impact: Provides comfort passive buff; helps maintain player mental health during long base construction sessions.

layman_description: A stun-delivery modification for melee batons using electrical charge.
technical_description: Weapon modifier with stun duration parameters and electrical damage application on successful hits.
player_impact: Enables non-lethal zombie control; allows players to corral and separate zombie groups tactically.

layman_description: Defensive barrier using multiple barbed wire strands for perimeter security.
technical_description: Barrier block with melee collision properties and continuous damage application to touching entities.
player_impact: Cheap defensive option that forces players to route around; effective for funnel-based trap design.

layman_description: Powdered bone fragments used as crop fertilizer for plant growth.
technical_description: Crafting ingredient with fertilizer effectiveness parameters for plant growth acceleration.
player_impact: Optional optimization for farming; reduces crop growth time if players invest in bonemeal production chains.

layman_description: A tall wooden bookshelf containing skill books and reading materials.
technical_description: Container block with specialized loot list targeting skill books and recipe learning opportunities.
player_impact: Critical resource for skill progression; enables players to unlock recipes without trader dependency.

layman_description: A cooked poultry leg that restores hunger with meat protein.
technical_description: Consumable food item with nutrition values and cooking time requirements from raw ingredients.
player_impact: Essential mid-game food source; supports extended survival expeditions without base dependency.

layman_description: A metal ammunition storage box containing small-caliber rounds.
technical_description: Loot container with weighted ammunition distribution favoring pistol and SMG cartridges.
player_impact: Ammo resource node that makes early gunplay viable; rewards exploration of tactical locations.

layman_description: A precision mechanical timer for trap activation coordination.
technical_description: Utility item with activation delay properties used in trap logic and automated base defense systems.
player_impact: Enables sophisticated trap timing; allows creation of sequenced trap corridors for maximum efficiency.

layman_description: The upper control panel of an old vending machine dispensing snacks.
technical_description: Functional container block with limited selection and pre-set item distribution mechanics.
player_impact: Decorative element that provides occasional snack items; low priority compared to other loot sources.

layman_description: Raw quartz crystal used in optical instruments and electronics.
technical_description: Mineral resource with smelting capability for electronics crafting progression chain.
player_impact: Rare resource required for electronics; motivates players to mine specific biome locations.

layman_description: A simple wooden gate for base perimeter access control.
technical_description: Door block with basic security rating and demolition health values for early-game base building.
player_impact: Initial gate option available with basic materials; easily destroyed by horde night attacks.

layman_description: A magnified optical scope for rifles providing extreme zoom capability.
technical_description: Weapon attachment with sight offset properties and scope parameter adjustments for precision targeting.
player_impact: Enables long-range elimination; allows sniping from safe distance during combat encounters.

layman_description: An automated flamethrower turret mounted on wall for area denial.
technical_description: Active defense block with fuel consumption rates and damage radius properties for continuous area hazard.
player_impact: Powerful deterrent that consumes fuel quickly; requires fuel supply lines to maintain utility.

layman_description: Cooked beef meat that substantially restores hunger and stamina.
technical_description: Cooked consumable with regeneration values and satiety duration properties for survival mechanics.
player_impact: High-nutrition food that supports extended exploration; can be farmed from zombie corpses and animals.

layman_description: A military supply crate with tactical equipment and weapon caches.
technical_description: High-value container with increased legendary item drop rates and weapon focus in loot tables.
player_impact: Tier-progression milestone; finding these crates significantly accelerates player equipment advancement.

layman_description: Raw lead ore used in ammunition and radiation shielding.
technical_description: Mineral resource with smelting output values and ammunition crafting requirement chains.
player_impact: Essential for ammo production; forces players to establish sustainable mining operations.

layman_description: A commercial bookstore display with extensive skill and recipe books.
technical_description: Large container block with maximized book output and skill recipe distribution for learning mechanics.
player_impact: Premium learning location; accessing these unlocks multiple crafting recipes enabling autonomous gameplay.

layman_description: A simple cloth headwrap providing basic head protection.
technical_description: Armor piece with minimal armor rating and weight classification for early survivability.
player_impact: First armor item available; provides essential head protection preventing instant death from headshots.

layman_description: A toxic gas cloud created by chemical hazard block damage.
technical_description: Hazard effect with duration mechanics and gas damage application to breathing entities.
player_impact: Environmental hazard; forces players to use gas masks or find alternate routes through contaminated areas.

layman_description: Additional padding material for armor pieces improving protective coverage.
technical_description: Armor modifier with armor rating increase values and weight distribution properties.
player_impact: Incremental armor improvement; allows players to boost existing gear without replacing it.

layman_description: A portable toolbox containing basic hand tools and supplies.
technical_description: Container block with tool item specialization and repair material distribution.
player_impact: Common loot that provides steady stream of repair materials during early progression.

layman_description: Reclaimed brass metal fragments for ammunition and electronic components.
technical_description: Scrap resource with melting recipes for ammunition crafting and alloy production chains.
player_impact: Reliable ammunition component source; ensures players can maintain firearm usage.

layman_description: An embedded kitchen oven for cooking prepared meals.
technical_description: Functional appliance block with fuel consumption and cooking recipe output lists.
player_impact: Base infrastructure allowing food preparation without inventory burden; supports large-scale farming.

layman_description: Raw meat from animal corpses requiring cooking before consumption.

layman_description: An office file cabinet containing documents and desk supplies.
technical_description: Container block with paper and document item loot priorities for reading materials.

layman_description: Barbed wire strung across ceiling for vertical area denial.

technical_description: Accessory item with radiation resistance modifiers and environmental hazard mitigation values.
